pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Ways to populate music:
1. Add your music in the /home/USERNAME/Music folder. (Upstream recommended) 2. From command line: LiriMusic PATH-TO-FILE 3. Drag and drop on top of desktop shortcut. 4. Use it as the program to handle the MIME type.
